data.name: HBDIE: The Nonce 2
data.detailed_description:
1 Month after the incident when streamer hbdie_ had touched a child and got sentenced to prison for 20 years in a Dover prison. However just 1 month after being in there hbdie has escaped, however the child is now in a new location... will you get found?

HBDIE: The Nonce is a First-Person game where you have to survive without being touched by the enemy. In order to survive in this game you have to do many tasks which include wearing a LIDL T-Shirt and collecting certain items to make the man disappear.
If you get touched by the man you will die! So don't get touched by him.

Features
  • Amazing Gameplay
  • Scary Fat Man
  • LIDL
  • DN

If you're not sold on this game yet, read the reviews above and just listen to what our very satisfied customers have to say about this amazing game!

data.short_description: 1 Month after the incident when streamer hbdie_ had touched a child and got sentenced to prison in a Dover prison. Will you get found?
data.reviews:
“go suck urself kid”
ur mum dont love you/10 – HBDIE_

“Wow, this game is just amazing!!!”
10/10 – Vesk

“This is a incredible game giving dramatical realistic scenario as this is based on a true story, this game gives all sorts of emotion, fear, happy, sad, annoyed and much more. This game will be a very big success knowing that it is based on a true story due to a nonce named hbdie.”
10/10 – FreshLeb

  • Storage: 650 MB available space

  • Storage: 650 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Well there is a bit of violence because the epic player has to use a gun which is rather spooky, however no blood is involved.
The extreme violence and sexual content in the game is that if the player gets touched by the enemy which is hbdie then they will die which some players may find sensitive.
